00066 static void *find_nearest_marker(int UNUSED(d1), int UNUSED(d2))
00067 {
00068     return NULL;

00070     
00071 static void select_surrounding_handles(Scene *scene, Sequence *test) /* XXX BRING BACK */
00072 {
00073     Sequence *neighbor;
00074     
00075     neighbor = find_neighboring_sequence(scene, test, SEQ_SIDE_LEFT, -1);
00076     if (neighbor) {
00077         neighbor->flag |= SELECT;
00078         recurs_sel_seq(neighbor);
00079         neighbor->flag |= SEQ_RIGHTSEL;
00080     }
00081     neighbor = find_neighboring_sequence(scene, test, SEQ_SIDE_RIGHT, -1);
00082     if (neighbor) {
00083         neighbor->flag |= SELECT;
00084         recurs_sel_seq(neighbor);
00085         neighbor->flag |= SEQ_LEFTSEL;
00086     }
00087     test->flag |= SELECT;
00088 }

00090 /* used for mouse selection and for SEQUENCER_OT_select_active_side() */
00091 static void select_active_side(ListBase *seqbase, int sel_side, int channel, int frame)
00092 {
00093     Sequence *seq;
00094 
00095     for (seq = seqbase->first; seq; seq = seq->next) {
00096         if (channel == seq->machine) {
00097             switch (sel_side) {
00098                 case SEQ_SIDE_LEFT:
00099                     if (frame > (seq->startdisp)) {
00100                         seq->flag &= ~(SEQ_RIGHTSEL | SEQ_LEFTSEL);
00101                         seq->flag |= SELECT;
00102                     }
00103                     break;
00104                 case SEQ_SIDE_RIGHT:
00105                     if (frame < (seq->startdisp)) {
00106                         seq->flag &= ~(SEQ_RIGHTSEL | SEQ_LEFTSEL);
00107                         seq->flag |= SELECT;
00108                     }
00109                     break;
00110                 case SEQ_SIDE_BOTH:
00111                     seq->flag &= ~(SEQ_RIGHTSEL | SEQ_LEFTSEL);
00112                     break;
00113             }
00114         }
00115     }
00116 }
00117 
00118 /* used for mouse selection and for SEQUENCER_OT_select_active_side() */
00119 static void select_linked_time(ListBase *seqbase, Sequence *seq_link)
00120 {
00121     Sequence *seq;
00122 
00123     for (seq = seqbase->first; seq; seq = seq->next) {
00124         if (seq_link->machine != seq->machine) {
00125             int left_match = (seq->startdisp == seq_link->startdisp) ? 1 : 0;
00126             int right_match = (seq->enddisp == seq_link->enddisp) ? 1 : 0;
00127 
00128             if (left_match && right_match) {
00129                 /* a direct match, copy the selection settinhs */
00130                 seq->flag &= ~(SELECT | SEQ_LEFTSEL | SEQ_RIGHTSEL);
00131                 seq->flag |= seq_link->flag & (SELECT | SEQ_LEFTSEL | SEQ_RIGHTSEL);
00132 
00133                 recurs_sel_seq(seq);
00134             }
00135             else if (seq_link->flag & SELECT && (left_match || right_match)) {
00136 
00137                 /* clear for reselection */
00138                 seq->flag &= ~(SEQ_LEFTSEL | SEQ_RIGHTSEL);
00139 
00140                 if (left_match && seq_link->flag & SEQ_LEFTSEL)
00141                     seq->flag |= SELECT | SEQ_LEFTSEL;
00142 
00143                 if (right_match && seq_link->flag & SEQ_RIGHTSEL)
00144                     seq->flag |= SELECT | SEQ_RIGHTSEL;
00145 
00146                 recurs_sel_seq(seq);
00147             }
00148         }
00149     }
00150 }

00165 static void UNUSED_FUNCTION(select_single_seq) (Scene * scene, Sequence * seq, int deselect_all) /* BRING BACK */
00166 {
00167     Editing *ed = seq_give_editing(scene, FALSE);
00168     
00169     if (deselect_all)
00170         deselect_all_seq(scene);
00171     seq_active_set(scene, seq);
00172 
00173     if ((seq->type == SEQ_IMAGE) || (seq->type == SEQ_MOVIE)) {
00174         if (seq->strip)
00175             BLI_strncpy(ed->act_imagedir, seq->strip->dir, FILE_MAXDIR);
00176     }
00177     else if (seq->type == SEQ_SOUND) {
00178         if (seq->strip)
00179             BLI_strncpy(ed->act_sounddir, seq->strip->dir, FILE_MAXDIR);
00180     }
00181     seq->flag |= SELECT;
00182     recurs_sel_seq(seq);
00183 }

00213     }

00217 /* (de)select operator */
00218 static int sequencer_de_select_all_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
00219 {
00220     int action = RNA_enum_get(op->ptr, "action");
00221 
00222     Scene *scene = CTX_data_scene(C);
00223     Editing *ed = seq_give_editing(scene, FALSE);
00224     Sequence *seq;
00225 
00226     if (action == SEL_TOGGLE) {
00227         action = SEL_SELECT;
00228         for (seq = ed->seqbasep->first; seq; seq = seq->next) {
00229             if (seq->flag & SEQ_ALLSEL) {
00230                 action = SEL_DESELECT;
00231                 break;
00232             }
00233         }
00234     }
00235 
00236     for (seq = ed->seqbasep->first; seq; seq = seq->next) {
00237         switch (action) {
00238             case SEL_SELECT:
00239                 seq->flag &= ~(SEQ_LEFTSEL + SEQ_RIGHTSEL);
00240                 seq->flag |= SELECT;
00241                 break;
00242             case SEL_DESELECT:
00243                 seq->flag &= ~SEQ_ALLSEL;
00244                 break;
00245             case SEL_INVERT:
00246                 if (seq->flag & SEQ_ALLSEL) {
00247                     seq->flag &= ~SEQ_ALLSEL;
00248                 }
00249                 else {
00250                     seq->flag &= ~(SEQ_LEFTSEL + SEQ_RIGHTSEL);
00251                     seq->flag |= SELECT;
00252                 }
00253                 break;
00254         }
00255     }
00256 
00257     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_SCENE | ND_SEQUENCER | NA_SELECTED, scene);
00258 
00259     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00260 }

00262 void SEQUENCER_OT_select_all(struct wmOperatorType *ot)
00263 {
00264     /* identifiers */
00265     ot->name = "(De)select All";
00266     ot->idname = "SEQUENCER_OT_select_all";
00267     ot->description = "Select or deselect all strips";
00268     
00269     /* api callbacks */
00270     ot->exec = sequencer_de_select_all_exec;
00271     ot->poll = sequencer_edit_poll;
00272     
00273     /* flags */
00274     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER | OPTYPE_UNDO;
00275 
00276     WM_operator_properties_select_all(ot);
00277 }

00280 /* (de)select operator */
00281 static int sequencer_select_inverse_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *UNUSED(op))
00282 {
00283     Scene *scene = CTX_data_scene(C);
00284     Editing *ed = seq_give_editing(scene, FALSE);
00285     Sequence *seq;
00286 
00287     for (seq = ed->seqbasep->first; seq; seq = seq->next) {
00288         if (seq->flag & SELECT) {
00289             seq->flag &= ~SEQ_ALLSEL;
00290         }
00291         else {
00292             seq->flag &= ~(SEQ_LEFTSEL + SEQ_RIGHTSEL);
00293             seq->flag |= SELECT;
00294         }
00295     }
00296 
00297     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_SCENE | ND_SEQUENCER | NA_SELECTED, scene);
00298     
00299     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00300 }

00317 static int sequencer_select_invoke(bContext *C, wmOperator *op, wmEvent *event)
00318 {
00319     View2D *v2d = UI_view2d_fromcontext(C);
00320     Scene *scene = CTX_data_scene(C);
00321     Editing *ed = seq_give_editing(scene, FALSE);
00322     short extend = RNA_boolean_get(op->ptr, "extend");
00323     short linked_handle = RNA_boolean_get(op->ptr, "linked_handle");
00324     short left_right = RNA_boolean_get(op->ptr, "left_right");
00325     short linked_time = RNA_boolean_get(op->ptr, "linked_time");
00326     
00327     Sequence *seq, *neighbor, *act_orig;
00328     int hand, sel_side;
00329     TimeMarker *marker;
00330 
00331     if (ed == NULL)
00332         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00333     
00334     marker = find_nearest_marker(SCE_MARKERS, 1); //XXX - dummy function for now
00335     
00336     seq = find_nearest_seq(scene, v2d, &hand, event->mval);
00337 
00338     // XXX - not nice, Ctrl+RMB needs to do left_right only when not over a strip
00339     if (seq && linked_time && left_right)
00340         left_right = FALSE;
00341 
00342 
00343     if (marker) {
00344         int oldflag;
00345         /* select timeline marker */
00346         if (extend) {
00347             oldflag = marker->flag;
00348             if (oldflag & SELECT)
00349                 marker->flag &= ~SELECT;
00350             else
00351                 marker->flag |= SELECT;
00352         }
00353         else {
00354             /* deselect_markers(0, 0); */ /* XXX, in 2.4x, seq selection used to deselect all, need to re-thnik this for 2.5 */
00355             marker->flag |= SELECT;             
00356         }
00357         
00358     }
00359     else if (left_right) {
00360         /* use different logic for this */
00361         float x;
00362         deselect_all_seq(scene);
00363         UI_view2d_region_to_view(v2d, event->mval[0], event->mval[1], &x, NULL);
00364 
00365         SEQP_BEGIN(ed, seq)
00366         {
00367             if (x < CFRA) {
00368                 if (seq->enddisp < CFRA) {
00369                     seq->flag |= SELECT;
00370                     recurs_sel_seq(seq);
00371                 }
00372             }
00373             else {
00374                 if (seq->startdisp > CFRA) {
00375                     seq->flag |= SELECT;
00376                     recurs_sel_seq(seq);
00377                 }
00378             }
00379         }
00380         SEQ_END
00381         
00382         {
00383             SpaceSeq *sseq = CTX_wm_space_seq(C);
00384             if (sseq && sseq->flag & SEQ_MARKER_TRANS) {
00385                 TimeMarker *tmarker;
00386 
00387                 for (tmarker = scene->markers.first; tmarker; tmarker = tmarker->next) {
00388                     if (((x <  CFRA) && tmarker->frame <  CFRA) ||
00389                         ((x >= CFRA) && tmarker->frame >= CFRA))
00390                     {
00391                         tmarker->flag |= SELECT;
00392                     }
00393                     else {
00394                         tmarker->flag &= ~SELECT;
00395                     }
00396                 }
00397             }
00398         }
00399     }
00400     else {
00401         // seq= find_nearest_seq(scene, v2d, &hand, mval);
00402 
00403         act_orig = ed->act_seq;
00404 
00405         if (extend == 0 && linked_handle == 0)
00406             deselect_all_seq(scene);
00407     
00408         if (seq) {
00409             seq_active_set(scene, seq);
00410     
00411             if ((seq->type == SEQ_IMAGE) || (seq->type == SEQ_MOVIE)) {
00412                 if (seq->strip) {
00413                     BLI_strncpy(ed->act_imagedir, seq->strip->dir, FILE_MAXDIR);
00414                 }
00415             }
00416             else
00417             if (seq->type == SEQ_SOUND) {
00418                 if (seq->strip) {
00419                     BLI_strncpy(ed->act_sounddir, seq->strip->dir, FILE_MAXDIR);
00420                 }
00421             }
00422     
00423             if (extend && (seq->flag & SELECT) && ed->act_seq == act_orig) {
00424                 switch (hand) {
00425                     case SEQ_SIDE_NONE:
00426                         if (linked_handle == 0)
00427                             seq->flag &= ~SEQ_ALLSEL;
00428                         break;
00429                     case SEQ_SIDE_LEFT:
00430                         seq->flag ^= SEQ_LEFTSEL;
00431                         break;
00432                     case SEQ_SIDE_RIGHT:
00433                         seq->flag ^= SEQ_RIGHTSEL;
00434                         break;
00435                 }
00436             }
00437             else {
00438                 seq->flag |= SELECT;
00439                 if (hand == SEQ_SIDE_LEFT) seq->flag |= SEQ_LEFTSEL;
00440                 if (hand == SEQ_SIDE_RIGHT) seq->flag |= SEQ_RIGHTSEL;
00441             }
00442             
00443             /* On Alt selection, select the strip and bordering handles */
00444             if (linked_handle && !ELEM(hand, SEQ_SIDE_LEFT, SEQ_SIDE_RIGHT)) {
00445                 if (extend == 0) deselect_all_seq(scene);
00446                 seq->flag |= SELECT;
00447                 select_surrounding_handles(scene, seq);
00448             }
00449             else if (linked_handle && ELEM(hand, SEQ_SIDE_LEFT, SEQ_SIDE_RIGHT) && (seq->flag & SELECT)) {
00450                 /*
00451                  * First click selects adjacent handles on that side.
00452                  * Second click selects all strips in that direction.
00453                  * If there are no adjacent strips, it just selects all in that direction.
00454                  */
00455                 sel_side = hand;
00456                 neighbor = find_neighboring_sequence(scene, seq, sel_side, -1);
00457                 if (neighbor) {
00458                     switch (sel_side) {
00459                         case SEQ_SIDE_LEFT:
00460                             if ((seq->flag & SEQ_LEFTSEL) && (neighbor->flag & SEQ_RIGHTSEL)) {
00461                                 if (extend == 0) deselect_all_seq(scene);
00462                                 seq->flag |= SELECT;
00463 
00464                                 select_active_side(ed->seqbasep, SEQ_SIDE_LEFT, seq->machine, seq->startdisp);
00465                             }
00466                             else {
00467                                 if (extend == 0) deselect_all_seq(scene);
00468                                 seq->flag |= SELECT;
00469 
00470                                 neighbor->flag |= SELECT;
00471                                 recurs_sel_seq(neighbor);
00472                                 neighbor->flag |= SEQ_RIGHTSEL;
00473                                 seq->flag |= SEQ_LEFTSEL;
00474                             }
00475                             break;
00476                         case SEQ_SIDE_RIGHT:
00477                             if ((seq->flag & SEQ_RIGHTSEL) && (neighbor->flag & SEQ_LEFTSEL)) {
00478                                 if (extend == 0) deselect_all_seq(scene);
00479                                 seq->flag |= SELECT;
00480 
00481                                 select_active_side(ed->seqbasep, SEQ_SIDE_RIGHT, seq->machine, seq->startdisp);
00482                             }
00483                             else {
00484                                 if (extend == 0) deselect_all_seq(scene);
00485                                 seq->flag |= SELECT;
00486 
00487                                 neighbor->flag |= SELECT;
00488                                 recurs_sel_seq(neighbor);
00489                                 neighbor->flag |= SEQ_LEFTSEL;
00490                                 seq->flag |= SEQ_RIGHTSEL;
00491                             }
00492                             break;
00493                     }
00494                 }
00495                 else {
00496                     if (extend == 0) deselect_all_seq(scene);
00497                     select_active_side(ed->seqbasep, sel_side, seq->machine, seq->startdisp);
00498                 }
00499             }
00500             recurs_sel_seq(seq);
00501 
00502             if (linked_time) {
00503                 select_linked_time(ed->seqbasep, seq);
00504             }
00505         }
00506     }
00507     
00508     /* marker transform */
00509 #if 0 // XXX probably need to redo this differently for 2.5
00510     if (marker) {
00511         int mval[2], xo, yo;
00512 //      getmouseco_areawin(mval);
00513         xo = mval[0];
00514         yo = mval[1];
00515         
00516         while (get_mbut()) {
00517 //          getmouseco_areawin(mval);
00518             if (abs(mval[0] - xo) + abs(mval[1] - yo) > 4) {
00519                 transform_markers('g', 0);
00520                 return;
00521             }
00522         }
00523     }
00524 #endif
00525     
00526     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_SCENE | ND_SEQUENCER | NA_SELECTED, scene);
00527 
00528     /* allowing tweaks */
00529     return OPERATOR_FINISHED | OPERATOR_PASS_THROUGH;
00530 }
00531 
00532 void SEQUENCER_OT_select(wmOperatorType *ot)
00533 {
00534     /* identifiers */
00535     ot->name = "Activate/Select";
00536     ot->idname = "SEQUENCER_OT_select";
00537     ot->description = "Select a strip (last selected becomes the \"active strip\")";
00538     
00539     /* api callbacks */
00540     ot->invoke = sequencer_select_invoke;
00541     ot->poll = ED_operator_sequencer_active;
00542     
00543     /* flags */
00544     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER | OPTYPE_UNDO;
00545     
00546     /* properties */
00547     RNA_def_boolean(ot->srna, "extend", 0, "Extend", "Extend the selection");
00548     RNA_def_boolean(ot->srna, "linked_handle", 0, "Linked Handle", "Select handles next to the active strip");
00549     /* for animation this is an enum but atm having an enum isn't useful for us */
00550     RNA_def_boolean(ot->srna, "left_right", 0, "Left/Right", "Select based on the current frame side the cursor is on");
00551     RNA_def_boolean(ot->srna, "linked_time", 0, "Linked Time", "Select other strips at the same time");
00552 }

00556 
00557 /* run recursively to select linked */
00558 static int select_more_less_seq__internal(Scene *scene, int sel, int linked)
00559 {
00560     Editing *ed = seq_give_editing(scene, FALSE);
00561     Sequence *seq, *neighbor;
00562     int change = 0;
00563     int isel;
00564     
00565     if (ed == NULL) return 0;
00566     
00567     if (sel) {
00568         sel = SELECT;
00569         isel = 0;
00570     }
00571     else {
00572         sel = 0;
00573         isel = SELECT;
00574     }
00575     
00576     if (!linked) {
00577         /* if not linked we only want to touch each seq once, newseq */
00578         for (seq = ed->seqbasep->first; seq; seq = seq->next) {
00579             seq->tmp = NULL;
00580         }
00581     }
00582     
00583     for (seq = ed->seqbasep->first; seq; seq = seq->next) {
00584         if ((int)(seq->flag & SELECT) == sel) {
00585             if ((linked == 0 && seq->tmp) == 0) {
00586                 /* only get unselected nabours */
00587                 neighbor = find_neighboring_sequence(scene, seq, SEQ_SIDE_LEFT, isel);
00588                 if (neighbor) {
00589                     if (sel) {neighbor->flag |= SELECT; recurs_sel_seq(neighbor); }
00590                     else neighbor->flag &= ~SELECT;
00591                     if (linked == 0) neighbor->tmp = (Sequence *)1;
00592                     change = 1;
00593                 }
00594                 neighbor = find_neighboring_sequence(scene, seq, SEQ_SIDE_RIGHT, isel);
00595                 if (neighbor) {
00596                     if (sel) {neighbor->flag |= SELECT; recurs_sel_seq(neighbor); }
00597                     else neighbor->flag &= ~SELECT;
00598                     if (linked == 0) neighbor->tmp = (void *)1;
00599                     change = 1;
00600                 }
00601             }
00602         }
00603     }
00604     
00605     return change;
00606 }

00610 /* select more operator */
00611 static int sequencer_select_more_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *UNUSED(op))
00612 {
00613     Scene *scene = CTX_data_scene(C);
00614     
00615     if (!select_more_less_seq__internal(scene, 0, 0))
00616         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00617 
00618     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_SCENE | ND_SEQUENCER | NA_SELECTED, scene);
00619     
00620     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00621 }

00640 
00641 /* select less operator */
00642 static int sequencer_select_less_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *UNUSED(op))
00643 {
00644     Scene *scene = CTX_data_scene(C);
00645     
00646     if (!select_more_less_seq__internal(scene, 1, 0))
00647         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00648  
00649     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_SCENE | ND_SEQUENCER | NA_SELECTED, scene);
00650     
00651     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00652 }

00672 /* select pick linked operator (uses the mouse) */
00673 static int sequencer_select_linked_pick_invoke(bContext *C, wmOperator *op, wmEvent *event)
00674 {
00675     Scene *scene = CTX_data_scene(C);
00676     View2D *v2d = UI_view2d_fromcontext(C);
00677     
00678     short extend = RNA_boolean_get(op->ptr, "extend");
00679     
00680     Sequence *mouse_seq;
00681     int selected, hand;
00682 
00683     /* this works like UV, not mesh */
00684     mouse_seq = find_nearest_seq(scene, v2d, &hand, event->mval);
00685     if (!mouse_seq)
00686         return OPERATOR_FINISHED;  /* user error as with mesh?? */
00687     
00688     if (extend == 0)
00689         deselect_all_seq(scene);
00690     
00691     mouse_seq->flag |= SELECT;
00692     recurs_sel_seq(mouse_seq);
00693     
00694     selected = 1;
00695     while (selected) {
00696         selected = select_more_less_seq__internal(scene, 1, 1);
00697     }
00698     
00699     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_SCENE | ND_SEQUENCER | NA_SELECTED, scene);
00700     
00701     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00702 }

00756 
00757 /* select handles operator */
00758 static int sequencer_select_handles_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
00759 {
00760     Scene *scene = CTX_data_scene(C);
00761     Editing *ed = seq_give_editing(scene, 0);
00762     Sequence *seq;
00763     int sel_side = RNA_enum_get(op->ptr, "side");
00764 
00765 
00766     for (seq = ed->seqbasep->first; seq; seq = seq->next) {
00767         if (seq->flag & SELECT) {
00768             switch (sel_side) {
00769                 case SEQ_SIDE_LEFT:
00770                     seq->flag &= ~SEQ_RIGHTSEL;
00771                     seq->flag |= SEQ_LEFTSEL;
00772                     break;
00773                 case SEQ_SIDE_RIGHT:
00774                     seq->flag &= ~SEQ_LEFTSEL;
00775                     seq->flag |= SEQ_RIGHTSEL;
00776                     break;
00777                 case SEQ_SIDE_BOTH:
00778                     seq->flag |= SEQ_LEFTSEL + SEQ_RIGHTSEL;
00779                     break;
00780             }
00781         }
00782     }
00783 
00784     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_SCENE | ND_SEQUENCER | NA_SELECTED, scene);
00785 
00786     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00787 }
00788

00802     
00803     /* properties */
00804     RNA_def_enum(ot->srna, "side", prop_side_types, SEQ_SIDE_BOTH, "Side", "The side of the handle that is selected");
00805 }

00807 /* select side operator */
00808 static int sequencer_select_active_side_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
00809 {
00810     Scene *scene = CTX_data_scene(C);
00811     Editing *ed = seq_give_editing(scene, 0);
00812     Sequence *seq_act = seq_active_get(scene);
00813 
00814     if (ed == NULL || seq_act == NULL)
00815         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00816 
00817     seq_act->flag |= SELECT;
00818 
00819     select_active_side(ed->seqbasep, RNA_enum_get(op->ptr, "side"), seq_act->machine, seq_act->startdisp);
00820 
00821     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_SCENE | ND_SEQUENCER | NA_SELECTED, scene);
00822 
00823     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00824 }

00844 
00845 /* borderselect operator */
00846 static int sequencer_borderselect_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
00847 {
00848     Scene *scene = CTX_data_scene(C);
00849     Editing *ed = seq_give_editing(scene, FALSE);
00850     View2D *v2d = UI_view2d_fromcontext(C);
00851     
00852     Sequence *seq;
00853     rcti rect;
00854     rctf rectf, rq;
00855     short selecting = (RNA_int_get(op->ptr, "gesture_mode") == GESTURE_MODAL_SELECT);
00856     int extend = RNA_boolean_get(op->ptr, "extend");
00857     int mval[2];
00858 
00859     if (ed == NULL)
00860         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00861 
00862     rect.xmin = RNA_int_get(op->ptr, "xmin");
00863     rect.ymin = RNA_int_get(op->ptr, "ymin");
00864     rect.xmax = RNA_int_get(op->ptr, "xmax");
00865     rect.ymax = RNA_int_get(op->ptr, "ymax");
00866     
00867     mval[0] = rect.xmin;
00868     mval[1] = rect.ymin;
00869     UI_view2d_region_to_view(v2d, mval[0], mval[1], &rectf.xmin, &rectf.ymin);
00870     mval[0] = rect.xmax;
00871     mval[1] = rect.ymax;
00872     UI_view2d_region_to_view(v2d, mval[0], mval[1], &rectf.xmax, &rectf.ymax);
00873 
00874     for (seq = ed->seqbasep->first; seq; seq = seq->next) {
00875         seq_rectf(seq, &rq);
00876         
00877         if (BLI_isect_rctf(&rq, &rectf, NULL)) {
00878             if (selecting) seq->flag |= SELECT;
00879             else seq->flag &= ~SEQ_ALLSEL;
00880             recurs_sel_seq(seq);
00881         }
00882         else if (!extend) {
00883             seq->flag &= ~SEQ_ALLSEL;
00884             recurs_sel_seq(seq);
00885         }
00886     }
00887 
00888     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_SCENE | ND_SEQUENCER | NA_SELECTED, scene);
00889 
00890     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00891 }

00905     ot->modal = WM_border_select_modal;
00906     ot->cancel = WM_border_select_cancel;
00907     
00908     ot->poll = ED_operator_sequencer_active;
00909     
00910     /* flags */

00912

00916 
00917 /* ****** Selected Grouped ****** */
00918 
00919 static EnumPropertyItem sequencer_prop_select_grouped_types[] = {
00920     {1, "TYPE", 0, "Type", "Shared strip type"},
00921     {2, "TYPE_BASIC", 0, "Global Type", "All strips of same basic type (Graphical or Sound)"},
00922     {3, "TYPE_EFFECT", 0, "Effect Type",
00923      "Shared strip effect type (if active strip is not an effect one, select all non-effect strips)"},
00924     {4, "DATA", 0, "Data", "Shared data (scene, image, sound, etc.)"},
00925     {5, "EFFECT", 0, "Effect", "Shared effects"},
00926     {6, "EFFECT_LINK", 0, "Effect/Linked",
00927      "Other strips affected by the active one (sharing some time, and below or effect-assigned)"},
00928     {7, "OVERLAP", 0, "Overlap", "Overlapping time"},
00929     {0, NULL, 0, NULL, NULL}
00930 };
00931 
00932 #define SEQ_IS_SOUND(_seq) ((_seq->type & SEQ_SOUND) && !(_seq->type & SEQ_EFFECT))
00933 
00934 #define SEQ_IS_EFFECT(_seq) (_seq->type & SEQ_EFFECT)
00935 
00936 #define SEQ_USE_DATA(_seq) (ELEM(_seq->type, SEQ_SCENE, SEQ_MOVIECLIP) || SEQ_HAS_PATH(_seq))
00937 
00938 static short select_grouped_type(Editing *ed, Sequence *actseq)
00939 {
00940     Sequence *seq;
00941     short changed = FALSE;
00942 
00943     SEQP_BEGIN(ed, seq) {
00944         if (seq->type == actseq->type) {
00945             seq->flag |= SELECT;
00946             changed = TRUE;
00947         }
00948     }
00949     SEQ_END;
00950 
00951     return changed;
00952 }
00953 
00954 static short select_grouped_type_basic(Editing *ed, Sequence *actseq)
00955 {
00956     Sequence *seq;
00957     short changed = FALSE;
00958     short is_sound = SEQ_IS_SOUND(actseq);
00959 
00960     SEQP_BEGIN(ed, seq) {
00961         if (is_sound ? SEQ_IS_SOUND(seq) : !SEQ_IS_SOUND(seq)) {
00962             seq->flag |= SELECT;
00963             changed = TRUE;
00964         }
00965     }
00966     SEQ_END;
00967 
00968     return changed;
00969 }
00970 
00971 static short select_grouped_type_effect(Editing *ed, Sequence *actseq)
00972 {
00973     Sequence *seq;
00974     short changed = FALSE;
00975     short is_effect = SEQ_IS_EFFECT(actseq);
00976 
00977     SEQP_BEGIN(ed, seq) {
00978         if (is_effect ? SEQ_IS_EFFECT(seq) : !SEQ_IS_EFFECT(seq)) {
00979             seq->flag |= SELECT;
00980             changed = TRUE;
00981         }
00982     }
00983     SEQ_END;
00984 
00985     return changed;
00986 }
00987 
00988 static short select_grouped_data(Editing *ed, Sequence *actseq)
00989 {
00990     Sequence *seq;
00991     short changed = FALSE;
00992     char *dir = actseq->strip ? actseq->strip->dir : NULL;
00993 
00994     if (!SEQ_USE_DATA(actseq))
00995         return changed;
00996 
00997     if (SEQ_HAS_PATH(actseq) && dir) {
00998         SEQP_BEGIN(ed, seq) {
00999             if (SEQ_HAS_PATH(seq) && seq->strip && strcmp(seq->strip->dir, dir) == 0) {
01000                 seq->flag |= SELECT;
01001                 changed = TRUE;
01002             }
01003         }
01004         SEQ_END;
01005     }
01006     else if (actseq->type == SEQ_SCENE) {
01007         Scene *sce = actseq->scene;
01008         SEQP_BEGIN(ed, seq) {
01009             if (seq->type == SEQ_SCENE && seq->scene == sce) {
01010                 seq->flag |= SELECT;
01011                 changed = TRUE;
01012             }
01013         }
01014         SEQ_END;
01015     }
01016     else if (actseq->type == SEQ_MOVIECLIP) {
01017         MovieClip *clip = actseq->clip;
01018         SEQP_BEGIN(ed, seq) {
01019             if (seq->type == SEQ_MOVIECLIP && seq->clip == clip) {
01020                 seq->flag |= SELECT;
01021                 changed = TRUE;
01022             }
01023         }
01024         SEQ_END;
01025     }
01026 
01027     return changed;
01028 }
01029 
01030 static short select_grouped_effect(Editing *ed, Sequence *actseq)
01031 {
01032     Sequence *seq;
01033     short changed = FALSE;
01034     short effects[SEQ_EFFECT_MAX + 1];
01035     int i;
01036 
01037     for (i = 0; i <= SEQ_EFFECT_MAX; i++)
01038         effects[i] = FALSE;
01039 
01040     SEQP_BEGIN(ed, seq) {
01041         if (ELEM3(actseq, seq->seq1, seq->seq2, seq->seq3)) {
01042             effects[seq->type] = TRUE;
01043         }
01044     }
01045     SEQ_END;
01046 
01047     SEQP_BEGIN(ed, seq) {
01048         if (effects[seq->type]) {
01049             if (seq->seq1) seq->seq1->flag |= SELECT;
01050             if (seq->seq2) seq->seq2->flag |= SELECT;
01051             if (seq->seq3) seq->seq3->flag |= SELECT;
01052             changed = TRUE;
01053         }
01054     }
01055     SEQ_END;
01056 
01057     return changed;
01058 }
01059 
01060 static short select_grouped_time_overlap(Editing *ed, Sequence *actseq)
01061 {
01062     Sequence *seq;
01063     short changed = FALSE;
01064 
01065     SEQP_BEGIN(ed, seq) {
01066         if (!((seq->startdisp >= actseq->enddisp) || (seq->enddisp < actseq->startdisp))) {
01067             seq->flag |= SELECT;
01068             changed = TRUE;
01069         }
01070     }
01071     SEQ_END;
01072 
01073     return changed;
01074 }
01075 
01076 static short select_grouped_effect_link(Editing *ed, Sequence *actseq)
01077 {
01078     Sequence *seq = NULL;
01079     short changed = FALSE;
01080     short is_audio = ((actseq->type == SEQ_META) || SEQ_IS_SOUND(actseq));
01081     int startdisp = actseq->startdisp;
01082     int enddisp   = actseq->enddisp;
01083     int machine   = actseq->machine;
01084     SeqIterator iter;
01085 
01086     SEQP_BEGIN(ed, seq) {
01087         seq->tmp= NULL;
01088     }
01089     SEQ_END;
01090 
01091     actseq->tmp = SET_INT_IN_POINTER(TRUE);
01092 
01093     for (seq_begin(ed, &iter, 1); iter.valid; seq_next(&iter)) {
01094         seq = iter.seq;
01095 
01096         /* Ignore all seqs already selected! */
01097         /* Ignore all seqs not sharing some time with active one. */
01098         /* Ignore all seqs of incompatible types (audio vs video). */
01099         if ((seq->flag & SELECT) || (seq->startdisp >= enddisp) || (seq->enddisp < startdisp) ||
01100             (!is_audio && SEQ_IS_SOUND(seq)) ||
01101             (is_audio && !((seq->type == SEQ_META) || SEQ_IS_SOUND(seq))))
01102         {
01103             continue;
01104         }
01105 
01106         /* If the seq is an effect one, we need extra cheking! */
01107         if (SEQ_IS_EFFECT(seq) && ((seq->seq1 && seq->seq1->tmp) ||
01108                                    (seq->seq2 && seq->seq2->tmp) ||
01109                                    (seq->seq3 && seq->seq3->tmp)))
01110         {
01111             if (startdisp > seq->startdisp) startdisp = seq->startdisp;
01112             if (enddisp < seq->enddisp) enddisp = seq->enddisp;
01113             if (machine < seq->machine) machine = seq->machine;
01114 
01115             seq->tmp = SET_INT_IN_POINTER(TRUE);
01116 
01117             seq->flag |= SELECT;
01118             changed = TRUE;
01119 
01120             /* Unfortunately, we must restart checks from the beginning. */
01121             seq_end(&iter);
01122             seq_begin(ed, &iter, 1);
01123         }
01124 
01125         /* Video strips bellow active one, or any strip for audio (order do no matters here!). */
01126         else if (seq->machine < machine || is_audio) {
01127             seq->flag |= SELECT;
01128             changed = TRUE;
01129         }
01130     }
01131     seq_end(&iter);
01132 
01133     return changed;
01134 }
01135 
01136 #undef SEQ_IS_SOUND
01137 #undef SEQ_IS_EFFECT
01138 #undef SEQ_USE_DATA
01139 
01140 static int sequencer_select_grouped_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
01141 {
01142     Scene *scene  = CTX_data_scene(C);
01143     Editing *ed   = seq_give_editing(scene, 0);
01144     Sequence *seq, *actseq = seq_active_get(scene);
01145     int type = RNA_enum_get(op->ptr, "type");
01146     short changed = 0, extend;
01147 
01148     extend = RNA_boolean_get(op->ptr, "extend");
01149 
01150     if (actseq == NULL) {
01151         BKE_report(op->reports, RPT_ERROR, "No Active Sequence!");
01152         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
01153     }
01154 
01155     if (extend == 0) {
01156         SEQP_BEGIN(ed, seq) {
01157             seq->flag &= ~SELECT;
01158             changed = TRUE;
01159         }
01160         SEQ_END;
01161     }
01162 
01163     if      (type == 1) changed |= select_grouped_type(ed, actseq);
01164     else if (type == 2) changed |= select_grouped_type_basic(ed, actseq);
01165     else if (type == 3) changed |= select_grouped_type_effect(ed, actseq);
01166     else if (type == 4) changed |= select_grouped_data(ed, actseq);
01167     else if (type == 5) changed |= select_grouped_effect(ed, actseq);
01168     else if (type == 6) changed |= select_grouped_effect_link(ed, actseq);
01169     else if (type == 7) changed |= select_grouped_time_overlap(ed, actseq);
01170 
01171     if (changed) {
01172         WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_SCENE | ND_SEQUENCER | NA_SELECTED, scene);
01173         return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
01174     }
01175 
01176     return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
01177 }
01178 
01179 void SEQUENCER_OT_select_grouped(wmOperatorType *ot)
01180 {
01181     /* identifiers */
01182     ot->name = "Select Grouped";
01183     ot->description = "Select all strips grouped by various properties";
01184     ot->idname = "SEQUENCER_OT_select_grouped";
01185     
01186     /* api callbacks */
01187     ot->invoke = WM_menu_invoke;
01188     ot->exec = sequencer_select_grouped_exec;
01189     ot->poll = sequencer_edit_poll;
01190     
01191     /* flags */
01192     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER | OPTYPE_UNDO;
01193     
01194     /* properties */
01195     RNA_def_boolean(ot->srna, "extend", FALSE, "Extend", "Extend selection instead of deselecting everything first");
01196     ot->prop = RNA_def_enum(ot->srna, "type", sequencer_prop_select_grouped_types, 0, "Type", "");
01197 }
